main event: An object, silver in color, elliptical in shape, was observed moving at a slow speed over Ann Arbor, Michigan.
interesting points: The object was 3-4 inches in diameter and looked like a satellite., The observation lasted for 5 minutes., The object's course was from WNW to ESE., The elevation during sighting was about 45 degrees., The case is considered a possible meteor observation.
witness description: John H. Osborne from Ann Arbor, Michigan
